I'm not as active as I should be, and I need to lose weight.

participant_2.background:
I went camping in the mountains and spent the time hiking, fishing, and swimming.
I used to be a singer in a church choir, but I had to quit because of my asthma.
i watch a lot of movies.
i have a 3 year old.
I spent my last birthday with my wife at a fancy restaurant, which was nice, but I would rather have gone to the Galapagos Islands again.

content.text: Good, thanks! I'm just getting ready to cook dinner.
I'm making some chicken soup with a side of rice.
That sounds delicious! I love chicken soup.
Me too! It's so comforting and warm.
I love camping! I went camping in the mountains last weekend.
That sounds fun! What did you do while you were there?
We hiked, fished, and swam. It was a great time.
I wish I could go camping. I'm not very active, so I should probably get into it more.
You should! It's a great way to get some exercise and enjoy the outdoors.
I'll have to try it sometime.
You should! Let me know if you do, and I can give you some tips.
